code:
bash
# .env.example

# Configuration de base de données SQLite
DB_NAME=librairie
DB_USER=sqlite
DB_PASSWORD=
DB_HOST=localhost
DB_PORT=5432

# Configuration de serveur web
FLASK_APP=app
FLASK_ENV=development
FLASK_DEBUG=1
FLASK_PORT=5000

# Configuration d'authentification
SECRET_KEY=secret_key
SECURITY_PASSWORD_SALT=security_password_salt

# Configuration de système d'emprunt de livres
BORROWING_EXPIRATION=7

# Configuration de notifications par email
MAIL_SERVER=smtp.gmail.com
MAIL_PORT=587
MAIL_USE_TLS=1
MAIL_USERNAME=email
MAIL_PASSWORD=password

# Configuration de dashboard administrateur
ADMIN_USERNAME=admin
ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin
